credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
title: Vase
description: White clay body, thrown.  Tall tapering baluster, incurving neck with turned out rim; no foot.  Dark green lily pads arranged around body with yellow water lilies in various stages of bloom at the shoulder, all against a reddish-brown ground.  Water grasses extend upward from the foot.  Around shoulder and neck and dropping downward are three stalactite-like areas incised and filled with electrodeposits of copper with a green patina.  Yellow interior; bottom glazed.  Allover yellow glaze, fine crackle.
name: Vase
